# region

**Instance Property**

The rectangular region of the input image that your Core Image Processor Kernel can use to provide the output.

## Declaration

```swift
var region: CGRect { get }
```

## Discussion



## Getting Supplemental Information for Image Processing

- **bytesPerRow**: The bytes per row of the CPU memory that your Core Image Processor Kernel can read pixelsfrom.
- **format**: The pixel format of the CPU memory that your Core Image Processor Kernel can read pixels from.
